TableView.name: VIEW_SMP7_PMM
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP7_PMM" ("DATA", "REGIONAL", "PMM", "SMP7", "SMP_A", "SMP_B") AS
WITH dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as (select DATA, HORA, PMM, CN, MSC, OK1_DRP, OK1_DRP_TCT, OKT, OK_ITCP from view_msc_vinculo_smp7 where codigo != 'NID'

),regionais AS
(SELECT REGIONAL.NOME AS regional, regional.* FROM REGIONAL WHERE indicador_smp = 'T'
),
dias AS
(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) data FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE - Level) FROM dual CONNECT BY Level < 15
),
pmms AS
(SELECT PMM.NOME AS pmm, PMM.INICIO, PMM.FIM FROM PMM
),
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms AS
(SELECT * FROM regionais r, dias d, pmms p
),
dados_x_pmm AS
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
pmm.NOME AS Pmm,
Reg.NOME AS regional,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.OK1_DRP, 0) + NVL(Tab.OK1_DRP_TCT, 0))), '0') AS Smp7_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.OKT, 0) - NVL(Tab.OK_ITCP, 0))), '0') AS SMP7_B
FROM
view_msc_cn_ativo_smp7 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN PMM pmm
ON Tab.HORA BETWEEN pmm.INICIO AND pmm.FIM
INNER JOIN Cn Cn
ON Cn.Nome = Tab.CN
INNER JOIN Metricview.Rel_Regional_Cod_Nacional Reg_Cod
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Cn = Cn.Id_Cn
INNER JOIN regionais Reg
ON Reg_Cod.Id_Regional = Reg.ID_REGIONAL
where tab.msc = b.msc
and tab.cn = b.cn
and to_date(to_char(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
and b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
pmm.NOME,
Reg.NOME
),
dados_finais AS
(SELECT reg.data,
reg.regional,
reg.pmm,
CASE
WHEN dados.SMP7_B = '0'
AND dados.Smp7_A != '0'
AND to_number(dados.Smp7_A) >= 0
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP7_B = '0'
AND dados.Smp7_A != '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.Smp7_A = '0'
AND dados.SMP7_B != '0'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SMP7_A / SMP7_B) * 100),2),'999990D99')), '0,00')
END AS smp7,
nvl(smp7_a,'0') smp7_a,
nvl(smp7_b,'0') smp7_b
FROM dados_x_pmm dados,
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms reg
WHERE reg.data = dados.Data(+)
AND reg.regional = dados.regional(+)
AND reg.pmm = dados.PMM(+)
)
SELECT dados_finais.data,
dados_finais.regional,
dados_finais.pmm,
CASE
WHEN dados_finais.smp7 != '0,00'
AND to_number(dados_finais.smp7) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(dados_finais.smp7,'.',',')
END AS SMP7,
smp7_a smp_a,
smp7_b smp_b
FROM dados_finais
ORDER BY 1,2,3;
